report.name: x_isac_sstconso

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
SELECT isst.pid ligne, lb.pnom lib_ligne, iet.ecet etape, iet.typetape type_etape, iet.libetape lib_etape, ita.acta tache, ita.libtache lib_tache, isst.acst sous_tache, isst.asnom lib_sous_tache, isst.aist type, isst.param_local zone_libre, DECODE(SUBSTR(NVL(isst.aist, ' '), 1, 2), 'FF', SUBSTR(isst.aist , 3, 4), isst.pid) imputation, lb.codsg dpg_ligne, ress.rnom nom, cons.ident code_ress, cons.CPIDENT RESP_ress, -- FAD PPM 64360 QC 1932 : Modification des paramètres transmis à la fonction, seul le FIDENT est nécessaire. -- la ligne contrat du forfait lié est incluse dans une seule situation du forfait lié et non dans la situation de la ressource en cours DECODE(CONS.PRESTATION, 'SLT', DECODE(PACK_LIGCONT.VERIF_FORFAIT(CONS.FIDENT), 'OK', CONS.FIDENT, NULL), NULL) ID_FORFAIT, DECODE(CONS.PRESTATION, 'SLT', DECODE(PACK_LIGCONT.VERIF_FORFAIT(CONS.FIDENT), 'OK', CONS.RNOM, NULL), NULL) LIB_FORFAIT, DECODE(CONS.PRESTATION, 'SLT', DECODE(PACK_LIGCONT.VERIF_FORFAIT(CONS.FIDENT), 'OK', CONS.SOCCONT, NULL), NULL) SOCIETE, DECODE(CONS.PRESTATION, 'SLT', DECODE(PACK_LIGCONT.VERIF_FORFAIT(CONS.FIDENT), 'OK', cons.NUMCONT, NULL), NULL) num_contrat, -- FAD PPM 64360 QC 1932 : Fin cons.jan jan, cons.fev fev, cons.mar mar, cons.avr avr, cons.mai mai, cons.jun jun, cons.jul jul, cons.aou aou, cons.sep sep, cons.oct oct, cons.nov nov, cons.dec dec, --BIP 32 changes done PACK_ARBITRE.FIND_REF_DEMANDE(NULL,DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER,PI.PROJAXEMETIER,lb.PID) Ref_demande, PACK_ARBITRE.FIND_REF_DEMANDE_LIB(DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER,PI.PROJAXEMETIER,lb.PID) Ref_demande_Lib,
/*pack_arbitre.FIND_REF_DEMANDE(NULL,DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER,PI.PROJAXEMETIER,lb.PID) Ref_demande, DECODE((SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(pack_arbitre.FIND_REF_DEMANDE(NULL,DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER,PI.PROJAXEMETIER,lb.PID)) AND ROWNUM = 1 ), NULL,'???', (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(pack_arbitre.FIND_REF_DEMANDE(NULL,DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER,PI.PROJAXEMETIER,lb.PID)) AND ROWNUM = 1 )) Ref_demandeLib ,*/ --BIP 32 changes done (SELECT LIBTYET FROM TYPE_ETAPE WHERE iet.typetape = TYPE_ETAPE.TYPETAP AND ROWNUM = 1 ) TypeEtapeLib , DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER DpCopiAxeMetierCode , DECODE(DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER, NULL, NULL, DECODE( (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER) AND ROWNUM = 1 ), NULL, '???', (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(DPCOPI.DPCOPIAXEMETIER) AND ROWNUM = 1 )) ) DpCopiAxeMetierLib, PI.PROJAXEMETIER ProjAxeMetierCode , DECODE(PI.PROJAXEMETIER, NULL, NULL, DECODE( (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(PI.PROJAXEMETIER) AND ROWNUM = 1 ), NULL, '???', (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(PI.PROJAXEMETIER) AND ROWNUM = 1 )) ) ProjAxeMetierLib, TACHEAXEMETIER TacheAxeMetierCode , DECODE(ita.TACHEAXEMETIER, NULL, NULL, DECODE( (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(ita.TACHEAXEMETIER) AND ROWNUM = 1 ), NULL, '???', (SELECT DMPLIBEL FROM DMP_RESEAUXFRANCE WHERE TRIM(DMPNUM) = TRIM(ita.TACHEAXEMETIER) AND ROWNUM = 1 )) ) TacheAxeMetierLib, cons.DPG_ress DPG_ress, lb.pcpi RESP_ligne FROM ligne_bip lb JOIN proj_info pi ON lb.icpi = pi.icpi LEFT JOIN DOSSIER_PROJET_COPI DPCOPI ON PI.dp_copi = DPCOPI.dp_copi
JOIN isac_sous_tache isst ON isst.pid = lb.pid JOIN isac_etape iet ON isst.etape = iet.etape JOIN isac_tache ita ON isst.tache = ita.tache
JOIN (SELECT i.ident, i.sous_tache, s.CPIDENT CPIDENT, s.CODSG DPG_ress, s.FIDENT FIDENT, r.RNOM RNOM, s.PRESTATION, l.SOCCONT SOCCONT, l.NUMCONT NUMCONT, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '01', i.cusag, 0)) jan, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '02', i.cusag, 0)) fev, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '03', i.cusag, 0)) mar, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '04', i.cusag, 0)) avr, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '05', i.cusag, 0)) mai, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '06', i.cusag, 0)) jun, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '07', i.cusag, 0)) jul, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '08', i.cusag, 0)) aou, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '09', i.cusag, 0)) sep, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '10', i.cusag, 0)) oct, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '11', i.cusag, 0)) nov, SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'MM'), '12', i.cusag, 0)) dec
FROM isac_consomme i JOIN datdebex d ON TO_CHAR(i.cdeb, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(d.datdebex, 'YYYY') --FAD QC 1883 LEFT JOIN SITU_RESS s ON s.ident = i.ident AND (trunc(i.cdeb)>=trunc(s.datsitu)) AND (trunc(i.cdeb)<=trunc(s.datdep) or s.datdep is null) LEFT JOIN ressource r on s.fident = r.ident LEFT JOIN ligne_cont l on s.fident = l.ident AND s.datsitu >= l.lresdeb AND s.datdep <= l.lresfin
GROUP BY i.ident, i.sous_tache, s.CPIDENT, s.CODSG, s.FIDENT, r.RNOM, s.PRESTATION, l.SOCCONT, l.NUMCONT ) cons ON isst.sous_tache = cons.sous_tache JOIN ressource ress ON cons.ident = ress.ident
&P_WHERE
ORDER BY isst.pid , iet.ecet, ita.acta , isst.acst, cons.ident;

function.name: afterpform
